mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address(user_id, postal_code, address1, address2, receiver, phone, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{postalCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{receiver}, #{phone}, #{isDefault})
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET postal_code = #{postalCode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, receiver = #{receiver}, phone = #{phone}, is_default = #{isDefault} WHERE id = #{id}
